original_text: So he departed from there and found Elisha the son of Shaphat, who was plowing with twelve yoke of oxen in front of him, and he was with the twelfth. Elijah passed by him and cast his cloak upon him.
korean_text: 엘리야가 거기서 떠나 사밧의 아들 엘리사를 만나니 그가 열두 겨릿소를 앞세우고 밭을 가는데 자기는 열두째 겨릿소와 함께 있더라 엘리야가 그리로 건너가서 겉옷을 그의 위에 던졌더니

sentences.original_text: and found Elisha the son of Shaphat
who was plowing with twelve yoke of oxen
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 열두 쌍의 소로 밭을 갈고 있었다

sentences.original_text: and he was with the twelfth
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 열두 번째 소와 함께 있었다

sentences.original_text: and cast his cloak upon him
